recent_messages.content: Alright, let's see if this saves the history -this- time
Fingers crossed on the history this round. If it sticks, we're golden—what's next on the agenda?
Well the history was saving. So you probably have the history from what just happened, minus knowing that we had a crash
Got it—history's intact on my end, and yeah, the crash isn't in my logs. Smooth sailing now? What's the next test or task?
Yeah, seems smooth now. No crash on your response. Everything is moving smoothly
Glad to hear it's all stable. Ready for whatever's next—your call.
What was the very last thing you said to me
Glad to hear it's all stable. Ready for whatever's next—your call.
Excellent! We have smooth history loads between cli and tui
Sounds like a solid victory. What's next in the lineup?
Now I can finally start integrating everything and making this application shine
Sounds like you're on a roll—exciting phase ahead. If you need a hand with integration tweaks or brainstorming, just say the word.
